message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features and capabilities. We believe it could significantly benefit your business or personal needs. Would you like to proceed with this exclusive opportunity?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $10000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. However, given the high-quality materials and advanced technology used in this item, we're unable to reduce the price below $12000. We believe this is a fair valuation considering its unique features and benefits. If you're still interested, please let me know.
